mapper.insert: insert into lib_member (name, phoneNumber, identificationNumber, bookNumber, borrowTimes, createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy, libId) values (#{MIVO.name}, #{MIVO.phoneNumber}, #{MIVO.identificationNumber}, #{MIVO.bookNumber}, #{MIVO.borrowTimes}, #{MIVO.createTime}, #{MIVO.createBy}, #{MIVO.updateTime}, #{MIVO.updateBy}, #{libId})
mapper.select:
select name, phoneNumber, identificationNumber, bookNumber, borrowTimes from lib_member where libId = #{libId}
and (`name` like concat('%',#{LMQVO.keywords},'%') or `phoneNumber` like concat('%',#{LMQVO.keywords},'%') or `identificationNumber` like concat('%',#{LMQVO.keywords},'%'))
